title: Blog-Based Remote Collaborative Science Writing Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and experience in online communication
context.additional_context: Aimed at enhancing collaborative writing skills through socially networked learning in the sciences.

learning_goals: Learners can generate and share more than five idea units (IUs) per week in a blog-based collaborative environment
Learners perform and incorporate peer review feedback three times through semi-formal writing on science topics
Learners achieve over 80% participation in blog discussions by the end of the four-week course
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
